title: The Last Resort
overview: The title refers to a genteel mountain hotel that might be a peaceful retreat for its guests. But for the waiters, a group of struggling college students in search of hard cash, it's a whole different story. Michael Lerner is a good-looking young guy who is studying to be a doctor. As is the case with most mountain resorts the waiters, who have diverse personalities, must learn to cope with the demands of their guests while trying to get along with one another.Â
